ingredients.ingredient: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Brown ground beef thoroughly and drain excess fat before combining with other ingredients
Heat cream cheese gently with soup and milk until smooth, stirring constantly to prevent lumps
Cook macaroni slightly underdone as it will continue cooking when combined with hot ingredients
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach proper cream cheese incorporation to avoid lumps and techniques for combining pasta and sauce.
